bio:
Emilia Technologies is a private limited IT company incorporated in year 2012 with a motto to deliver Lean and Intelligent technology solutions to Customers with the help of a very Energetic and smart team. We are a technology focused company based out of Chandigarh, India.

Our primary office is at IT Park Chandigarh, India and the other one is situated at MDC - 5 Panchkula, Haryana, India. 

With a team of over 30 skilled and professional team members, we are exploring the different dimensions of technological advancements. We are focused towards the development of ethical long term relationships with customers world wide.

Our team works from Monday to Saturday 9 AM to 6:30 PM IST but our Customers can reach us through Email, Skype and Phone 24x7. We value our Customers time and ensure that they don't any hassle trying to reach us for their urgent and critical business needs.

commnet: Very good work! I can recommend Reginas services for translations in any respect!
We were very pleased with Regina's conscientious approach to the work and we have an excellent outcome.
Regina was a pleasure to do business with.... while our project was rather simple, she handled it quickly and did a quality job. We will use her again.
Regina provided high quality results on a tedious and difficult project. Excellent to work with, I look forward to requesting her service on future projects. I highly recommend her.
for Transcription of Historical Tax Records
Excellent in all aspects - German translation job done to highest standards - very capable, efficient and prompt, friendly, and very easy to deal with. Thank you very much Regina.
